title: Harley-Davidson - motorcycle sales by region 2017/2018
summary: In general Retail sales in units has stayed the same over the Year.
Retail sales in units is slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The highest Retail sales in units, of value 10081.0 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Retail sales in units about 9690.0 was reached at Year 2018
min_summary: Overall Retail sales in units has decreased over the Year.
